alert.note: Alert for Merrick; Nance; Polk (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 03 at 7:02PM CDT until October 03 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR EASTERN NANCE...NORTHERN YORK...NORTHEASTERN MERRICK AND POLK COUNTIES... At 701 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Silver Creek to near Duncan to near Shelby, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Automated Weather Station. At 6:51 PM, 65 MPH wind was reported 7 E of Clarks, NE. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Shelby around 705 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Thayer. This includes Interstate 80 near mile marker 342. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
